resources.string: Russia has the largest area of any country in the world.T
Fingernails and hair continue to grow after death.F
The Enlightenment was an intellectual movement that celebrated religious faith over reason.F
Carl Lewis holds the record for most individual gold medals at the Olympics.F
The mosquito has caused more human deaths than any other creature in history.T
Corn is the most produced crop in the world.T
The name \"Wall Street\" stems from the row (\"wall\") of banks that greeted visitors to New York City\'s financial district in the 1800s.F
Vincent van Gogh sold only one painting during his lifetime. F
The Academy Awards are annually the most-watched, single telecast in the United States.F
The \"funny bone\" is really a bone.F
